meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joshua Simmons Rayma Haas Rob Groves Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6566.

td.p: Joshua Simmons, a cook from Little Rock, Arkansas
Rayma Haas, a reading tutor from Seattle, Washington
Rob Groves, a classics lecturer from Los Angeles, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,500)

tr.td: PAN AM
COMPOUND WORDS
LESSER-KNOWN NAMES
RAISING THE BAR
SKYSCRAPERS
SONGS BY THE WOMEN OF COUNTRY

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Pan Am flew Vietnam War servicemen to their destinations for R&R, short for this & recreation')

tr.td: Pan Am flew Vietnam War servicemen to their destinations for R&R, short for this & recreation
